title: Project Engineer - Pre-forming (72471-105)
text:
Fixed term contract until 31 March 2017. 
Are you ready to join an expanding team in the field of composite manufacturing? 
Do you have the appetite and skills to perform composite manufacturing process research and/or the characterisation of composite materials? 
If so, come and contribute to the UKâ€™s High Value Manufacturing Catapult based at WMG and co-located with Jaguar Land Rover and Tata Motors European Technical Centre. 
You will have significant experience of product R&D and manufacturing processes engineering in an industrial context, coupled with the ability to actively engage with industry collaborators and project partners. Manufacturing processes of particular relevance include preforming of continuous fibre reinforcements and prepregs. 
If you have what it takes to succeed at the interface between industry and academia in cutting edge research, and a demonstrable understanding of polymer composites processing then we would like to hear from you. 
You will possess a good honours degree (2.1 or above) or equivalent in an engineering or related discipline, together with a serious appetite to engage in project delivery. Navigation
